statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{2 \, x^{3} - x + 3 , -5 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x + 21 , 16 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x - 14 , -6 \, x^{3} + 10 , 3 \, x^{3} - 5\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.

answer.p: A basis of W is \left\{2 \, x^{3} - x + 3 , -5 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x + 21\right\}.
